website_summaries.verdict: Excellent choice for experienced Spyderco knife owners who want a more compact version of their military-grade model.
pros: Matte finish on handle and blade improves camouflage
cons: Difficult to open and close blade

customer_reviews.title: Fake sold by Amazon Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the knife from Amazon Warehouse The knife is not only the WRONG ITEM. It's also COUNTERFEIT. A good counterfeit at that. It's only little details that give it away. Details like the 90°corner near the compression lock not being ever so slightly rounded off. The extremely sharp burr around the lanyard hole. The small wave gaps between the scales and the liners. The way things dont line up. And most importantly the knife is completely UNSAFE there is significant blade play and some form of delamination or crack in the steel on the blade edge. ordered a para 2 and I was sent a para 3 clone. Absolutely inexcusable from a Spyderco authorized dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Buschman

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: Got one of the many fakes, clones, non-genuine copies, counterfeit copies floating around out there.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Well, I got my new knife "fix"
customer_reviews.text: First Impressions. This is my first spydero co. I just had to have it. It appears and feels genuine. The grips feel nice, the blade cuts hair, the lock is interesting. I think I'll us this as my 2nd edc. I'll carry this to beat up, and my Kershaw Launch 7 for defense. I dislike the location of the pocket clip, but at least there are holes to change that. However I have no F-ing clue where to get those screw drivers. Am I happy with it, yes. Was I expecting more, maybe. It is not too big and does not take up that much pocket space like everyone says. stfu.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Best EDC
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been carrying this knife for nearly two years now. I’ve tried finding something to replace it with, but I can’t find anything better. It feels so great in the hand, locks up so well, and stays sharp. I’ve used it at work and thought I messed up the black finish on the blade, but it was actually aluminum that rubbed off of what I was working on. The finish still looks excellent! The knife costs a good bit, but I never go anywhere without it. Other knives may look more tacticool or classic, but this knife is 100% no BS.
customer_reviews.author: Corey M.

customer_reviews.title: A Crowd Pleaser
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my groomsmen, took them to a jeweler to get them engraved they came out amazing. Every body loves them. I have had Spydercos in the past and other brands. I usually like a serrated blade but the straight edge is nice. I also like the durability and the fact that Spyderco stands behind their products and is a delight to deal with. This one is currently making a push to replace my Benchmade 6800SBK APB as my EDC. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good quality EDC made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Z13

customer_reviews.title: Just a great knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of knives to improve my collection recently and this one was a gem. It's light, fast and the action on the blade is incredible right out of the box. The G-10 handle is light and the texturing makes it easy to hang onto. I do wish the clip were configured tip up, but that's an easy fix. The pivot needed just a llllliiiiitle adjustment but it works great now. The black coated S30V blade is beautiful with the G-10 handle. It's wafer thin and feels great in hand or clipped to the pocket. It's just a super attractive knife that anyone would love.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S Morris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent EDC
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a high quality work knife that was user friendly. I'm a wind turbine technician and wear gloves everyday. The handle on this knife is fantastic with or without gloves. It's easy to fold and put away. My favorite part of the knife oddly enough is the pocket clip. The pocket clip is very sturdy and holds tightly. I'm going to use the heck out of this blade until it's worn out or broken. I feel like since I use a knife for what it is made for, it is going to last for a very long time. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Redman

customer_reviews.title: Best knife in my tool belt so I keep it in my pocket, always.
customer_reviews.text: Never been so pleased and I truly use this knife every day in many many ways. From scraping grout or cutting out caulking to slicing tomatoes this knife opens quickly and closes as swiftly. All year performance. For some reason, this particular one is even better than the exact same pm2 in digital cameo lost in grass and mud locked open and somewhere in the woods. This one closes so fast it's ...just magnificent. Extremely pleased after years of hard use.
customer_reviews.author: Will B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! But not fan of dlc coating
customer_reviews.text: This is easily one of my favorite knives Ive ever owned and it has inspired me to start collecting. Ergonomics and weight are amazing for the size it feels very light in pocket. The blade is razor shape but keep in mind the tip is rather fragile mine was slight chipped/broken from a single sideways drop. Overall I love the knife but if I could go back I would have gotten the satin finished blade. The dlc blade coating is tough and looks awesome but causes considerable drag on the blade when cutting due to friction between the rough coating and material.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: The best, cool-looking EDC pocket knife out there
customer_reviews.text: I love it and replaced the clip with a deep pocket clip from MXG Gear. An all around great feeling knife but will change the scales (narrow feeling) for a more rounded one that will give me a better fit in my hand. This knife will be one of my everyday-carry (EDC) knives, along with my Benchmade Griptilian. This is my third Spyderco. I also have the Spyderco Delica 4 mini-pocket knife and the Spyderco Bushcraft knife; I love them all. All great knives!
customer_reviews.author: Coqui

customer_reviews.title: XXL Razor Blade
customer_reviews.text: The knife is excellent. Weak tip by design because it's a syringe. Outstanding at slicing. Great ergonomic handle G10 grippy and grabby handles. Great deployment after breaking it in. The best knife steel IMO. Stays sharps for months upon months. Lightweight, so it disappears in your pocket. Black DLC is fantastic, attractive and doesn't chip easy. Adds rust resistance to already great rust resistant steel. Pros: One tough Son-Of-A-B*tch, Made in USA, lightweight, strong, stupid sharp, durable, as rust resistant as it gets, great grip and traction. Cons: Weak Tip. Black DLC has to be cleaned and oiled to look perfect. Bought in Summer 2016 for $130. Great value,
customer_reviews.author: Rafael A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blade.
customer_reviews.text: This is only my second spyderco purchase and I have to say this is my new favorite knife. I collect knives and I must say next to other knives of equal or higher value this paramilitary is impressive. Extremely impressive. Would cut a slice of phone book paper like nothing. Users are always looking out for fakes since spyderco knives are cloned a lot! This was one concern I had however my pm2 came fast, in all original packaging with papers. Looked the knife over real well and it's definitely a legit spyderco.
customer_reviews.author: Jon mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Confirm that your knife is real.
customer_reviews.text: The PM2 I received was definitely real. I have a large collection of high end knives, all of which were substantially more expensive than this one (2 to 5 times the cost, Chris Reeves, Zero Tolerance, Microtech, other Spyderco, etc.) yet this is the one that is usually my EDC knife.
customer_reviews.author: C P

customer_reviews.title: The tip may be too fragile for serious bushcraft work but I believe the Paramilitary 2 is the perfect urban EDC blade
customer_reviews.text: As a collector of over 50 high end knives such as Strider and Zero tolerance the Paramilitary 2 finds it’s way into my pocket most days in urban environments. The tip may be too fragile for serious bushcraft work but I believe the Paramilitary 2 is the perfect urban EDC blade. Utility or defensive, this is the perfect EDC folder in my opinion. I can put an absolutely screaming edge on the PM2 that surpasses any factory edge I’ve seen. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it was delicate and kinda got loose and lame as it got older
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit dubious about this, to tell the truth. The last Spyderco I had (30+ years ago) was a SEKI from Japan, and it was delicate and kinda got loose and lame as it got older. This knife will be hangin' with the cockroaches after the Apocalypse. And it is SOOOO good in the hand! Feels like I woke up and this knife had grown in my hand overnight...it just fits.This thing is surgical and precise and beautiful. And insanely sharp out of the box.Some reviewers unfortunately got a fake. I didn't. Nice job Spydies! I'm a fan going forward.
customer_reviews.author: TBird

customer_reviews.title: There is no better knife period
customer_reviews.text: Returned this knife but not because of the knife. Accidentally ordered this item but having already owned two this knife is a gem. A pm2 is widely known and accepted as one of the best folding knives ever made. If you don’t own one you must buy one. There is no better knife.
customer_reviews.author: Buckaloo

customer_reviews.title: best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: it's a 5/5 i love this knife got it today and already in love not fake what so ever. has all the right markings gimping is right to! it has the 3 cut outs in the knife unlike clones witch have 2. the spider logo is correct to. the pivot screws are right sizes to. g 10 scales are so good to grip, also the steel is so good. so razor sharp out of the box it gently brushed it aginst my arm and it took off half the hair. smoothest closing action ever. P.S this was my first spyderco
customer_reviews.author: Memphis Mom

customer_reviews.title: Definitely The Real Thing!
customer_reviews.text: After a thorough inspection I am delighted with every feature of this knife. Wicked sharp, unbelievably light, smooth as glass locking mechanism. Zero blade play. Watched several reviews on the Para, Para2 and Para3. The Para and the Para2 are the winners because I prefer a little bigger blade. There are some pictures of the Black model with bright screws, I don't know if that's an option or not because mine are all black.
customer_reviews.author: NOYFB

customer_reviews.title: Just buy already, you know you need one.
customer_reviews.text: Standard EDC all others get compared to. The back lock reminds me of Windows 10. Forget years of being trained one way, here do it this way now. The blade, the action in opening , the feel of the grip, the jimping is all too notch. You'll learn the back lock :D.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: There is a ton of reviews on youtube. This ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a ton of reviews on youtube. This knife is light, sharp, and well balanced. The blade is perfectly centered. It is expensive but this knife should last a long time. After a few months of carrying, I see some wear pattern on the G-10 scale. The blade is still razor sharp.
customer_reviews.author: WadeL

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.  Amazing.  SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I positive I could say has already been said on here. Just make sure you fold it up every time! I was opening some boxes and left it open while I worked; setting it down next to my phone. When my phone rang I touched the blade for a moment, putting a pretty deep cut on one of my fingers. Very little damage was done as the cut was so narrow; so it was easily closed and healed quickly. Sharpest blade I have ever seen out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Bass

customer_reviews.title: My favorite EDC knife !
customer_reviews.text: Great feel , fast blade deployment , razor sharp. This is a good all around every day carry for my purposes . Spyderco always makes great knives . This is my 3rd different one in 18 years . They always have lasted
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy YatesTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: EDC Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love my pm2. Only wish I didn't take so long to finally get one. Comes razor sharp. It's light. Scales are nice and grippy. The jimping is actually useful. Blade came perfectly centered of course. Yes it's on the larger side for an EDC knife but dammit I love it. Again it's light enough that you can clip it in the pocket and forget it's there. Purchased a set of brass scales... Made a lanyard with a brass bead... Super happy with how it's turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian C.

customer_reviews.title: It'll last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: This was the first edc pocket knife that I ever purchased. I love the grip of this knife and the blades edge is strong. It was a bit larger than I expected, but it's still functional. If I had known Spyderco would have released the paramilitary 3 shortly after I bought this, I'd go with the PM3 without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Knife for sure
customer_reviews.text: If you're eyeing this knife, you probably have been for a while. It's well worth the price. Sharp out of the box, super high quality finish and feel, very solid lock, and super ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: The best knife in my opinion on
customer_reviews.text: I waited over a year to write a review for this knife. It's my edc knife and when it braked or wares out I will by another one. I use it for everything. It's easy to sharpen holds an edge good, light in your pocket you don't notice it unless you need it. Update knife is still going and still my EDC knife 6/23/20
customer_reviews.author: Lance Cockerell

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite knives
customer_reviews.text: Seriously I love this thing. The G10 handles feel great in the hands. The locking mechanism is completely solid, the blade has no play in it at all and the action is buttery smooth. This is a knife that was designed to take abuse. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Was between Manix 2 and this. Went w PM2 because of weight and blade shape. Lock sometimes pinches when opening but no big deal. Love it. Came much sharper and better quality than Benchmades I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: Precisely what I was hoping for. The ParaMilitary 2 exceeds my expectations and is by far the best knife I have owned to this point. Everything on it works brilliantly and I can't wait to get some solid use out of it. Looking forward to adding more Spyderco knives to my collection in the not too distant future. If you're contemplating ordering this knife, debate no further.
customer_reviews.author: Carstar

customer_reviews.title: Best Knife, 100% Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate to buy this knife, you will not regret it. It is the sharpest, smoothest, and best knife I have ever owned, and I have had many knives. It is a bit pricey but it is worth it. I got it for $122. I even sold some of my other knives I never used, and it completely covered the cost. I was a bit concerned ordering with all the reproductions floating around, but Amazon is an authorized distributor for Spyderco. If you buy sold and shipped from amazon, there will be no worry. They also have great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife
customer_reviews.text: Best knife I have. I have several Spydercos and a Benchmade, this is the absolute favorite. Great blade, on this knife and the grips are the best part. Although it is larger than what I typically carry, the profile in my pocket is slim and the clip is well made too. No looseness after 5 months of daily carry. The locking mechanism is great, and I prefer it over the traditional lock back Spydercos usually use. STRONGLY RECOMMEND THIS KNIFE. It has replaced my Endura in my Spyderco carry.
customer_reviews.author: DunhamAll

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it arrived on time. I've owned many knives (Benchmade, Cold Steel, CRKT, Gerber, etc.) and the quality on this one seems excellent. I like the spider hole more than the pegs on some of my other knives. It feels good in my hand and in my pocket. Being made in the US is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: joshu r wheetley

customer_reviews.title: Love the knife but as usual with Spyerco
customer_reviews.text: Love the knife but as usual with Spyerco, one of the screws on the pocket clip came out and got lost within first week. If you are reading this Spyderco.... ITS CALLED LOCTITE
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: is exactly as shown online when arrived
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my husband for Father's Day. My brother has something similar and was using it for a wide array of things while doing some work around the house. My husband wanted something to have handy in a "pinch" if needed. It is sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Delucchi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I held this knife in my hand at ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I held this knife in my hand at a gun shop and didnt like it. Now that i own it, it is really growing on me. I keep it in my gun box as a back up to my endura 4. As i am not 21 and cannot carry a gun on my person, but i can carry it in a sealed container in my car.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Great knife.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this one so far. Plan to use as an edc knife. My first spyderco. Have a few higher end kershaws and a ZT but this one is my fadorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ryker94

customer_reviews.title: Amazing knife, have been using for the last 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing knife, have been using for the last 3 years as edc and it hasn’t disappointed. I’ve dropped it so many times and it’s held up great. Black color and finish look sick and don’t wear easily.
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: My first high end knife. I love it. It feels amazingly comfortable in the hand and is light in the pocket. The knife cut through carpet effortlessly and retained a good edge. It's easy to modify with backspacers, lanyards and clips and it begs to be used. Get this knife. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rothfuss

customer_reviews.title: Nice design - 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I used to with Benchmade and ZT ones but adapt using this Spyderco lock in no time. Action is smooth and light weight. Handle is wide enough to have full and firm grasp. Blade looks weird at first but it makes sense once you have it open and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife. Ergonomics are great along with the action ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome knife. Ergonomics are great along with the action of the knife. Five stars for this version even though I ended up returning the knife for the left handed version (see my Amazon review of the Left Handed Military 2).
customer_reviews.author: Buckaroo Banzai

customer_reviews.title: it is still good. This is a step up in so many ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Had the Endura for years of trusty use. Still have it, and though worn, it is still good. This is a step up in so many ways. All of the + reviews are true. Amazing American workmanship. If you can afford this, buy it. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I waited for this knife because it's definitely worth the wait. I know it's not the cheapest knife, but this blade is a thing of beauty. Out of the box, this blade is razor sharp. I'm a big fan of the G10 textured handles, it doesn't feel like it's going to slip out of your handle. The action was a little stiff, but has loosened up over time. The only thing I would mention to potential buyers is beware of fakes. There's plenty info out there on the internet that will educate you on what to look for in spotting the fakes. I know for 100% fact that the Spyderco I bought wasn't a fake.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: This is on the large size for an everyday carry but in my pocket it's very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind paying for high quality American craftsmanship. That's what this knife is. Smooth action, razor sharp CPM S30V steel and a clever rear locking mechanism. This is on the large size for an everyday carry but in my pocket it's very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scrub tech

customer_reviews.title: Buy directly from Amazon and you won't have to worry about receiving a counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the finest knife I've ever owned! The fit and finish is exquisite, the blade is razor sharp and the function is smoother than skating on flat ice! I've never been able to justify paying this much for a knife, but I can honestly say that it's worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bridgman

customer_reviews.title: Spyd PM2 best EDC
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of this knife. Spyderco knives just feel right. I have several Spydercos but this PM2 has become my new EDC. Edge retention not the best with the S30V as expected but I still love it. I need to get one with CPM-20CV steel. Nirvana awaits.
customer_reviews.author: Kteights

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Christmas. He said it’s the best one he’s had by far. Like most men he has a thing for pocket knifes and flashlights so coming from him I have to say that he is very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Knife Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: Only gripe it the belt clip. Makes the knife sit up high so I replaced it with custom clip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great EDC choice! I have carried my for a year using it daily.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife, I just feel like I paid a bit too much for it. There are others that are just as good with the same blade steel for half the price. Still.... I just had to have one.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight good for EDC
customer_reviews.text: This is my first choice for EDC. Is very light but very solid. Comes very sharp from the factory. High quality materials and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: I decided to go for this knife and I absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a beauty. It is very light, very solid and it fits in your hand perfectly. Not completely an EDC knife, it could if you wanted though. After reading many reviews, and watching plenty of videos, I decided to go for this knife and I absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite EDC
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, it is taking the place and may by “it”
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great folder. Handle is big enough and the knife opens incredibly smoothly. G-10 grip feels secure. The knife is very light. Build quality seems top notch. Only gripe is; no wrench was included to move the pocket clip to the other end of the knife.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Curry

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say that hasn't already been said? This is my second Spyderco, my first being an all black Spyderco Manix 2 XL G-10, which I absolutely love. The PM2 has replaced my little Cutco folder as my EDC, and I cannot use it enough. I begs to be handled.
customer_reviews.author: J.Hil

customer_reviews.title: Quality EDC
customer_reviews.text: I was mainly looking for a knife as an EDC as I am fishing in all of my free time. I had a buck knife from 2001 that had finally met it's end. This is a great replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Beebe

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this knife for my camping trip to Glacier National Park earlier this summer, and I'm glad I did. There is nothing that this knife can't cut. Prepared steaks with it, carved replacement tent stakes with it, and lots of other camp related chores. Simple and reliable construction with scalpel like cutting power. Superior quality, and definitely worth the higher price tag. If you're debating between Benchmade and Spyderco, don't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best EDC knife
customer_reviews.text: My EDC knife. Have 2. Shark as a razor out of the box. Just the right size. Easy to deploy and quality steel. Quality build with good fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My favorite knife over Benchmade 5700
customer_reviews.text: It’s a PM2. If you want one, but it from here. It authentic. Stop pussyfooting around. If you want to rock a PM2, buy this one, if not, go buy a benchmade. I love this knife and have carbon fiber scales on mine. It’s crazy sharp and performs when asked to perform.
customer_reviews.author: Zane M.

customer_reviews.title: Every day carry knife
customer_reviews.text: This brand is awesome, just quicker shipping on amazon rather than manufacturer website. My boyfriend is on his second one of this exact knife, it WILL last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been carrying this for awhile now, The compression lock takes some getting used to, but the knife feels so good in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic knife. Lightweight, strong, and very well made....it's expensive for a reason! The action is smooth and operation is a breeze. The "Spyder Hole" is not just a gimmick. It makes opening easy, and the release is wonderful too.
customer_reviews.author: Chad H

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected. BEST EDC PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: Like many people have said THIS IS THE BEST EDC FOR YOUR MONEY! I have had this knife for 2 days, the fit and finish is perfect centered the whole 9 yards. I was researching for my next knife for about a month and was on the fence there were a lot of choices and I pulled the trigger on this knife. If you are not sure which one to get then pick this one. YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Best EDC
customer_reviews.text: One of, if not the best EDC knife I've ever owned. Extremely sharp right out of the box. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jcox614

customer_reviews.title: Lovely piece of art.
customer_reviews.text: seems like an authentic Spyderco which was shipped from amazon, which I do appreciate very much. Materials are outstanding, aesthetic is solid. Wonderful first blade.
customer_reviews.author: Eric N

customer_reviews.title: Pocket change
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have the back of the knife filled in so pocket change would not get against the sharp edge and dull it,other than that the knife is great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great for the zombie apocalypse
customer_reviews.text: top shelf black razor. great for the zombie apocalypse. may be the sharpest knife i have. they say it's the highest end stainless steel on the market
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my uses
customer_reviews.text: Returned the Military and got this instead. I made the right decision for my purposes. The larger Military was awkward in my hand. The hinge is almost frictionless after a lubricant was appied (Hornady One Shot).
customer_reviews.author: teachermama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect edc.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife, sharp out of the box and after a few gentle strokes on a diamond rod and it's scapel sharp.
customer_reviews.author: wofse

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the build quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the build quality, sharpness and light weight of this pocket knife. Easily the best one I've used, ever!
customer_reviews.author: Ty Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: EDC PERFECTION
customer_reviews.text: Probably the finest pocket knife ever made. Perfection out of the box. No break in period. Smooth as silk on the bronze washers and sharp as a light saber. You'll never need another knife.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Knife
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and nice knife w/ great locking mechanism. A bit pricy however.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: 100% authentic, sticker on box just looks different
customer_reviews.text: As far as i can tell i got the real deal, as soon as i picked it up i could tell it was the quality of spyderco EDIT: The Spyderco paramilitary 2 i got from amazon is the real deal, how ever there are @$$holes out there that will send clones to amazon to get there money back, and rip off the people who actually want the real thing
customer_reviews.author: the truth

customer_reviews.title: Great knife to own!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This blade has taken over as my go-to EDC. Awesome fit and finish, lockup was astounding right out of the box. the action of the knife is a joy to have in hand. with a flick of my thumb, I can match some of my spring assisted folders! Blade was scalpel sharp out of the box also!! I can't find this blade in the "big box" stores at this price so do yourself a favor and pick one up.
customer_reviews.author: DuJuan Broadus

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Well crafted
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Well crafted, comes very sharp, feels good in the hand, love how easy it presents/opens. Subtract one star for cost.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Indy

customer_reviews.title: I got a perfect knife from Spyderco this time falwless
customer_reviews.text: I got a perfect knife from Spyderco this time falwless..when the pm2 is done right it stands out and screams quality..
customer_reviews.author: james yocum

customer_reviews.title: A tad on the large size but great design with smooth action
customer_reviews.text: A tad on the large size but great design with smooth action. Bet you dollars to donuts it’ll pass any sharpness test you put it through and has so far held its edge. Good EDC knife
customer_reviews.author: Competitor Rex

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best Spydercos I have owned (and I have owned many)
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best Spydercos I have owned (and I have owned many). I previously had a satin blade, camo handle version of the knife and sold it some time ago. I was looking to replace it nearly as soon as I sold it. There is something about the black on black, with DLC blade that not only looks cool, but really stands up to hard use. I think I will hang on to this one for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Squam1

customer_reviews.title: Well made and holds an edge extremely well. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and holds an edge extremely well. The texture on the scales is quite aggressive too. I even reduced the bite of the scales a bit with some 600 grit sand paper.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Major

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfection in my eyes. If the looks of the knife turns you on then buy it cause everything else about it is also perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: I love my new knife. ..so light you don't even feel it...Camouflage and black blade looks bad ass
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: GOOD JOB!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as gift. He left it on the top of his truck as he left the driveway. The package held up through being ran over several times. GOOD JOB!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: It was not for me, but for my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: It was not for me, but for my husband and it was his dream knife. He has wanted it for so long I was afraid it wouldn't live up to the image in his head, but if possible it has exceeded it. Very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Kmh

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ergonomics and a super smooth action. This knife is a good buy considering the fit and finish, and it's made in the USA as a bonus. My only complaint is that the edge was ground at a somewhat different angle on each side, but I suppose that can happen from most knife companies. It was still sharp. I recommend this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Huth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing knife
customer_reviews.text: Amazing knife, nothing much more to say about it. Blade is razor sharp and the blade deployment techniques are addicting. Would totally get another spyderco knife in the future.
customer_reviews.author: F. Messina

customer_reviews.title: Gret EDC!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent every day carry! Very sharp right out of the box, extremely well made, light, easy to open with one hand, solid locking mechanism. I removed the clip, which I find can cut my hand when battling bad guys, and simply keep it in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected, but carries well. Light and balanced. The DLC coding is tough stuff. The PM2 lives up to its reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Phinisee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome EDC!
customer_reviews.text: Mine was the real deal! Great knife smooth as butter! Very sharp out of the box! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Castle

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. I even paid to have it shipped at an airport when I forgot to add it to my checked luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Callaway

customer_reviews.title: The reason I carry it most days is because it’s a large folder that carries like a much smaller knife
customer_reviews.text: Enough has been said about the quality of this knife. The reason I carry it most days is because it’s a large folder that carries like a much smaller knife. Only draw back is the needle like tip is likely to break if the knife is misused.
customer_reviews.author: garrett

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately had to return
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this knife because tip was broken. Shame, I really liked it too!
customer_reviews.author: DSD

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and overall a great knife.
customer_reviews.text: A very handsome knife. Having read many many reviews, I was not the least bit dissapointed when I re cieved the knife. Very high quality and overall a great knife.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Heileson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pocket knife on the market bar none. Spyderco has really set the standard for excellence with the paramilitary 2 and the endura models.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Arnold

customer_reviews.title: I have heard of a bad review yet
customer_reviews.text: Top quality! A must have. I have heard of a bad review yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It's one of their flagships for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: Top quality, definitely not a fake. Just make sure it's coming from Spyderco.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B-dot

customer_reviews.title: Daily carry for 3 years...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, I put my knives though hell. Holds an edge well and I love the spine lock on this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, feel and ergonomics. Can definitely feel the quality in this knife. I usually stick to a particular knife brand but I was always told I had to own a spyderco. Especially a paramilitary. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Sold sceptic
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of my favorite knives I own. Haven't owned a spyderco in a while, but this is nice. I highly recommend this knife for EDC.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Patton

customer_reviews.title: Spyderco Paramilitary2 Black G-10 Black Blade
customer_reviews.text: Another great knife from Spiderco, not much more to say. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great knife. Don't know why I waited so long ...
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Don't know why I waited so long to get one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, beat bang for you buck on a us made knife you can get (speaking premium materials).
customer_reviews.author: NKurth

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit and Finish
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with fit and finish on the example I received, hope it was an isolated occurrence.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tice

product_meta.title: Spyderco para Military 2 Signature Folding Knife with 3.42" CPM S30V Steel Blade and Black G-10 Handle - PlainEdge - C81GPBK2
feature_bullets: AN IMPROVED CLASSIC - Undeniably one of Spyderco's most popular and in-demand designs, the Para Military 2 distills the world-class performance of our legendary Military Model into a more compact, pocket-friendly package.
SUPERIOR QUALITY - We kept the same high-performance full flat-ground blade but we've also lengthened the blade's tip and added additional surface jimping to both the spine and finger coil.
A SECURE GRIP - The G-10 handle is narrowed at the end improving the ergonomics. The handle and blade have been profile thinner; removing uncomfortable angles when in the closed position.
EASY-TO-USE - The Para Military 2 features extreme strength, reliability, and ease of use of our patented Compression Lock mechanism and versatility of a 4-position pocket clip.

DEPENDABLE - Refinements to overall construction may not be drastic but from the G-10 textured handle to the steel full flat blade, everything is sharper, smoother and guaranteed to provide performance and user comfort.
